SEARCH
Module com.psymk6
Package com.psymk6.controllers

Class SnakeController

java.lang.Object
com.psymk6.controllers.SnakeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable
public class SnakeController extends Object implements Drawable
The SnakeController class manages the behavior and movement of the snake in the SnakeGame. It handles user input for controlling the snake's direction and updates its position accordingly.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mateusz Klocek

      Constructs a SnakeController with the specified SnakeModel and Stage.
      Parameters:
      snakeModel - The SnakeModel associated with the snake.
      stage - The Stage from which the Scene is obtained for handling key events.

      public void checkHitBlockade(BlockadeController blockadeController)
      Checks if the snake has hit a blockade and updates its state accordingly.
      Parameters:
      blockadeController - The BlockadeController to check for collisions with the snake.
